name: hejs
description: open-source engine with API for Real-time questions In Hebrew.

scripts.build-client: concurrently "cd client" "npm install --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix client"
scripts.deploy: concurrently -m=1 "git add ." "git commit -m "updated"" "git push origin main" "git push heroku main"

author: Gurel Ben Shabat
